mapper.sql: t.id, t.org_code, t.patient_id, t.visit_org_name, t.visit_org_code, t.visit_dept_name, t.visit_dtime, t.visit_way, t.resp_doctor_name, t.doctor_code, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from patient_record where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_record ( org_code, patient_id, visit_org_name, visit_org_code, visit_dept_name, visit_dtime, visit_way, resp_doctor_name, doctor_code, last_update_dtime ) values( #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update patient_record set org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_org_name = #{visitOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_org_code = #{visitOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_dept_name = #{visitDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_dtime = #{visitDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, visit_way = #{visitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resp_doctor_name = #{respDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_code = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
